sense.def:
To clutch something
pomeni nekaj zelo trdno držati.

seg.quote: Myra came in, clutching her handbag.
Her pony stumbled, and she clutched at the reins.

sense.def:
To be in the clutches of another person
pomeni biti v oblasti nekega človeka;

seg.quote: He escaped the clutches of the law.

sense.def:
The clutch
je pedal v avtomobilu, ki ga pritisnemo, preden zamenjamo prestavo, in mehanizem, ki ga uravnava.
sense.QP:
glej slikovno prilogo
CAR AND BICYCLE
.
